title: 04/26/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/26/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP returns from his son's wedding. Dan discussed his inability to keep his emotions in check as well as competing with son's new father in law. As the NFL Draft approaches this Thursday, Albert Breer joined the show to talk about which QBs could miss, what the latest is on Mac Jones and Justin Fields, and more news. Lastly, fresh off retirement, Alex Smith joins the show to talk about his post-playing life and how he is in better shape than last year at this time.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
